query.sql: select o.id as id,o.loginName as username,o.name as name,o.pwd as password,o.salt as salt,o.dictionaryData as status from User o where (o.loginName =:loginName) or (o.phone = :loginName)

select o from User o where (1=1) and (o.dictionaryData in ('1','2')) and (o.id in :ids) and (:organId is null or :organId='' or o.id in (select p.person.id from PostInformation p where p.organization.id=:organId))
select p.id as id,t.name as name,o.code as code from sys_users t ,org_post_information p,org_organization o where t.id= p.person_id and p.organization_id=o.code and p.isleaf in (:leafs)
select o from Role o where (1=1) and (o.name in (select u.role from UserRole x where x.ywid in (:ywids)))
select o.code from SYS_Permission o where (1=1) and (o.code in (select x.permission from Org_User_Permission x where x.ywid=:userId)) and (o.role_id in (:roles))
select o from AppTree o where (1=1) and (o.code in (select ra.app.code from RoleApp ra where ra.role.name in (:roles))) order by o.lxh asc
select o from Person o where (1=1) and (o.id in (select p.person.id from PostInformation p where p.organization.code=:organId and p.xh=999)) order by o.name asc
